data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Ajax with the kick-off.
Goal! Ajax have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Klaas-Jan Huntelaar.
In the minute 7, Antony Santos with an assist there.
Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 2-0 through Quincy Promes.
Great play from Antony Santos to set up the goal.
In the minute 35, Antony Santos puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Ryan Gravenberch instrumental with a fine assist.
Pol van Boekel blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, It's Zwolle with the kick-off after the break.
The away team have replaced Mike Van Duinen with Manuel Pherai. This is the first substitution made today by John Stegeman.
Bram Van Polen is replacing Dean Huiberts for Zwolle at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 46, Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a first substitution, with Edson Alvarez replacing Davy Klaassen.
John Stegeman is making the team's third substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Pelle Clement replacing Rico Strieder.
Kenneth Taylor is replacing Perr Schuurs for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 74, John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a fourth substitution, with Clint Leemans replacing Mustafa Saymak.
The home team have replaced Antony Santos with Victor Christoffer Jensen. This is the third substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
Erik ten Hag is making the team's fourth substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Lisandro Martinez replacing Daley Blind.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Nicolas Tagliafico with Devyne Rensch.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
Goal! Ryan Gravenberch extends Ajax's lead to 4-0.
